title: Legis-lator
shortDescription: A full stack web application that allows users to search for and view the text of laws passed by the United States Congress.
description: Legis-lator is a comprehensive full-stack web application designed to make legislative information more accessible and understandable. The platform allows users to search for and view the text of laws passed by the United States Congress, with AI-powered features that summarize complex legislation and answer user questions.
detailedDescription: This project demonstrates advanced full-stack development skills, combining a robust Java Spring Boot backend with a modern Vue.js frontend. The application integrates with OpenAI's API to provide intelligent summaries and interactive Q&A capabilities, making complex legal documents more digestible for the average citizen.
features: Search and browse U.S. Congressional legislation
AI-powered law summarization using OpenAI API
Interactive AI Chatbot system for legal documents
User-friendly interface built with Vue 3 and Vite

title: Roblox Game Development
shortDescription: A collection of Roblox games and systems built using Lua, featuring advanced scripting, AI behavior, economy systems, and custom UI.
description: A diverse portfolio of Roblox games showcasing advanced Lua scripting, game design principles, and creative gameplay mechanics. Projects range from tycoon-style resource management games to immersive adventure experiences and atmospheric horror games.
detailedDescription: This collection represents years of game development experience on the Roblox platform, demonstrating proficiency in Lua programming, client-server architecture, and game design. Each project features custom-built systems including AI behaviors, economic models, inventory management, and polished user interfaces.
features: Custom tycoon games with complex economy systems
Adventure games with quest systems and progression
Maze games with AI pathfinding and exploration
Custom UI/UX with modern design principles

title: AI & Machine Learning Experiments
shortDescription: A collection of small-scale AI and ML projects exploring data analysis, model training, and algorithm experimentation.
description: An experimental portfolio of machine learning projects focused on exploring various ML algorithms, data analysis techniques, and model optimization strategies. These projects utilize real-world datasets to solve practical problems and deepen understanding of AI/ML concepts.
detailedDescription: This collection showcases hands-on experience with modern machine learning frameworks and libraries. Projects include classification tasks, regression analysis, and computer vision applications. Each project emphasizes clean code, proper data preprocessing, and model evaluation best practices.

title: Full Stack Hardwood Marketplace Website
shortDescription: A sleek e-commerce platform for buying and selling handmade hardwood furniture.
description: A modern e-commerce platform specifically designed for artisan woodworkers to showcase and sell their handmade hardwood furniture. The platform features real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and a beautiful, responsive interface that highlights the craftsmanship of each piece.
detailedDescription: Built with modern web technologies, this marketplace provides small woodworking businesses with an affordable, scalable platform to reach customers online. The site features advanced filtering, detailed product pages, customer reviews, and an intuitive admin dashboard for inventory and order management.
features: Responsive product catalog with advanced filtering

title: Personal Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, interactive portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
description: A sleek, responsive personal website designed to highlight my technical skills, portfolio projects, and professional journey. The site serves as a central hub for my work in software development, engineering, and entrepreneurship.
detailedDescription: Developed as a fully responsive single-page application, this personal website integrates modern web technologies to create an engaging user experience. It features dynamic project displays, an interactive timeline of experience, and contact integration. The design emphasizes clarity, speed, and visual appeal, providing visitors with a clean and intuitive way to explore my work.
features: Dynamic project showcase with filters and categories
About and skills sections with animations
